name: Zenmaku - LD41
description:
Zenmaku is a "Zen Bullet Hell" created for Ludum Dare 41 - "Combine 2 incompatible genres".

Dodge the bullets and collect the enemies.

Controller is highly recommended, though keyboard is available.

Update

  1. Altered spacing of enemies to reduce clutter
  2. Improved hitbox of enemies
  3. Lowered difficulty of first enemy

Original version is still available
